product_name: Kryptonite KryptoLok Series 2 U-Lock with 4' Flex Cable
long_description: This Kryptonite KryptoLok Series 2 U-lock with Flex cable is a convenient combination for deterring bike theft. Stout 13mm hardened steel shackle resists cutting and leverage attacks; vinyl coating offers protection for your bike's finish. 4 ft. KryptoFlex(TM) 10mm-thick braided steel cable provides good cut resistance for securing a front wheel or accessories. Reinforced, hardened crossbar design provides increased protection. Disc-style cylinder delivers a high level of security; rotating dust cover helps protect cylinder. Bumpers reduce rattling noise while you're transporting the U-lock. Comes with 2 stainless steel keys and mounting bracket along with the U-lock and cable. Eligible for Key Safe Program; register your key number with Kryptonite for easy replacement of lost or worn keys for a minimal fee. Kryptonite rates this lock combo a 6 on their 10-point system with 1 being simple, deterrent security and 10 being extreme security.
short_description: This Kryptonite KryptoLok Series 2 U-lock with Flex cable is a convenient combination for deterring bike theft.
